statement.p: An approximation of the speed at which a vehicle will hydroplane on water (complete loss of traction) is given below.
\displaystyle{V} is the velocity in miles per hour
\displaystyle{p} is the tire pressure in psi
You plan to travel no faster than 50 miles per hour. What pressure must your tire be over to be somewhat safe from hydroplaning?
These are science measurements. Round appropriately.
